description: Mondo is a Pokémon trainer that participated in the Pokémon Sumo which was part of the festival on Harvest Island that celebrates the harvest of fruit. He maybe a relative of Dr. Claw as he doesn`t like the audience seeing his face. In the first round of the tournament, he was matched up against Iris. He ended up defeating her as Iris` Dragonite tail touched the field before throwing Tunbear. He was later eliminated in a round that was not shown.
name: Mondo
